1.content:
You're dad is gone. Again. This time busy on a 'business retreat'. You lie down in your bed, pull up the covers and try to relax. You can distantly hear your older sister, Kelsey, talking on the phone as she always is. You ignore it and fade into a blissful sleep.

You're chest is heavy. You can't breathe. It's as if a dream has passed into real life. You open your eyes and pull yourself out from the layer of blanket. You rub your eyes, wondering why that dream seemed so real. The suffocation. Upon opening your eyes it becomes clearer. A vast landscape of wrinkled blanket cascades before you. What? How is that possible? You walk across the soft land that is your bed. "I must be dreamin--"

"No, no, lemme ask him." A familiar voice from outside your door echos. The door creaks open. "Hey, will you babysit--" Your sister steps in. A small but noticeable vibration goes through you. In the doorway, she stands. Her tall enormity dominating the room. The girl who was once shorter than you now was many times your small size.

"Where did he go?" She resumes her call "No, I have to take care of Mary, sorry. No, I don't know where he went" Her voice fades. You grab a hold of the blanket and manage to slide down, your feet hitting the carpet floor. You venture through the swampy softness that is your carpet. You move around various objects on your floor, discarded by you. Now they blocked your path to the door. After a long while of moving, you arrive at the door and slip under the lower crack. You enter the enormous, bright hallway. To your left is Mary's room, the front door, and the kitchen. To your right, is Kelsey's room. You know that you need help to figure out what has happened
1.title: The shrinking.

11.content: Surly there would be someone outside who could help you. You run to the door and sneak out. On the enormous sidewalk, you run out, looking for any sort of help. Looking around desperately, you are able to see a..
11.title: Go to front door

12.content:
You scramble across the hardwood floor into the kitchen. This is your best bet of contacting them. You look around, getting familiar with the area and your inch size. The counter seems like a cliff and even the low chairs seem unreachable. You hear a door in the hallway open and after a minute shut. Kelsey walks in, in her arms is Mary. She sets Mary down on the hard floor and walks out. As the toddler walks around, you can't help but tremble at her sheer size. You don't even make it past her small foot. The carefree girl walks around, exploring different things in the kitchen. You realize that this is easily your best option to get help: Have Mary deliver you.

Mary is occupied toying with herself. You run over to her socked foot, climbing it is hard. You keep slipping as you get a hold of it. Finally, you get on top of it. You feel a drop of wetness land near you. The toddler was drooling onto the floor. You stand and grab a hold of her pants and hoist yourself up a little. You do this many times. As you reach the front of her small pants, she begins toddling. You almost fall off as she waddles. You look around for safety..
12.title: Go to Kitchen

121.content:
Mary's little toddler pocket is a good place to stop while she runs around. You manage to get a hold of it and pull yourself inside. You fall deep into the massive crevasse, landing at the bottom. Mary keeps walking and her leg slams into the pocket every time she steps, throwing you around the small space. After being tossed around violently, your sister stops for a moment, you try to enjoy it. From above, a small hand you recognize as your sisters drops something down toward you. You look up at her pacifier falling at you. With nowhere to go it lands on top of you, pining you deep in her pocket. The saliva drenches your small body and the sticky substance traps you.

After another couple minutes the hand returns, this time grabbing the mouth piece and lifting it. In an instant it hits you: You're stuck to it. You're lifted into the air with it. The distance between you and the hard floor is huge. Your baby sister turns it and you find yourself looking at her mouth, you scream as the lips part and her wet breath wash over you. The lips get closer and closer, overtaking you. They soon close and in the darkness her tongue lifts off the bottom of her mouth, it scouts you, gently touching your body. Then it attacks, aggressively grinding against your apparently tasty body. Her taste buds scrape against you as the distant rumble of her feet echo. You scream as the saliva envelopes you. Your little sister is going to rub you into nothing and not even know! You desperately try to escape the situation, and after a few minutes of torture..
121.title: In her pocket

1211.content:
You fall off of the rubber trap that held you, her tongue still licking it and sucking on it. You climb over her emerging teeth and approach her lips, you hope she doesn't notice. You dive between the lips, trying to slip through, your baby sister walks around, oblivious to the fact that shes kissing her older brother. You step back after failing to get though, then you see it, liquid pours through a small gap in her lips, you manage to slip through, covered in her drool, you slide out of her mouth. A blinding light hits you as you fall down a titanic waterfall, landing in a sticky area on the front of her face. You find that your trapped again, this time on the outside of her face.

You watch as she toddles and plays, more saliva slowly drips around you as she runs about. After a half hour of watching your sister play, you hear your older sister announce..
1211.title: You escape!

choices: "..You have a bug on you sweetie.."
12112.content:
You feel Mary picked up and you jiggle on her baby cheek as Kelsey carries her across the house, finally, you feel Mary being lowered. With a bump your giant baby sister gets comfortable in her stroller, your older sister buckles her up, and you quickly find yourself being taken down the street on your sisters cheek. More drool falls onto you, keeping you stuck to her. Small bits of old food are in it. You try to ignore it all as the stroller turns into the daycare center. Your baby sister jumps out of the stroller and runs quickly inside. You are hit with heavy wind and feel helpless as she runs inside with your other sister. After being signed in, she is set free. She runs about the room in an unpredictable way. You manage to see a few other kids, some older than others, playing around.

Then, your sister is stopped by a girl, who obviously works there. She is pretty young, but too old to be a kid there. She looks right at you for a few seconds..
12112.title: "Time for daycare"

121121.content:
The woman frowns and looks at you.

"...You have a bug on you sweetie..here." She gets a wipe and you watch as it gets bigger and bigger until it surrounds you, you feel her pinch you off of your sisters face. In one way, you're happy to finally escape your sister, in another, you're terrified of what she will do with you. You feel the wipe being carried without much thought across the day-care, in an instant you feel it dropped. You feel yourself pulling the wipe as it parachutes down. Finally it hits the ground. You stand up and look around..
121121.title: "..You have a bug on you sweetie.."

choices: Too late a diaper drops on you
1211211.content: Your in the trash can looking as the daycare walk a s few miles away uncaring of the outcome of the little bug she picked off of your little sisters face 2 minutes ago and you see your sister playing dolls a couple miles away (to your size). And when you look down you see that the can is not even filled to the top and you see the wipe you used for a parachute and a 2 day old girls pull-up the size of a mountain and few cups of pudding and your standing on that one pull-up.
1211211.title: You're in the trash can

1211212.content: You walk out of the wipe and onto the floor. The carpet goes up to your knees as you look at the massive day-care center. This is bad, kids play around everywhere. You need to find safety, either with your little sister, or with some sort of adult. Across the room, a woman is sitting, reading a book, you could make your way to her and get assured help, you look at the room you would have to cross, kids, some as old as 6 or 7 run around. You could be ground into their sneakers, or if they see you, worse. Closer to you, you see a chest. The chest looks safe, well safer than where you're stuck now. You could make your way to that and hide..
1211212.title: You missed the can!

12112121.content: You start walking through the room, careful not to get in the way of any kids. You make it about halfway there, you see the woman, closer now, still reading. The final half is full of kids, some babys are crawling around while the older kids run past them. You start sprinting, your 1 inch body moving painfully slow. You are just about to get to the woman when...
12112121.title: To the woman!

121121211.content: A hand lowers in front of you, It is small and soft, you crash into it full-force without time to stop. The hand closes around you into a fist and you find yourself surrounded by young skin. The hand moves around, you feel a distant rumbling as the kid walks around. You feel yourself go upsidedown and the hand opens. You fall into a pocket. Upon landing at the bottom, you see many other small toys laying deep in the warm clothes pocket. The pocket begins to sway as they walk around. You need to escape! You start climbing up the pocket wall, as you reach the top..
121121211.title: Grabbed!

1211212112.content: You poke your head out of the pocket and see kids running by. The daycare seems a lot more familiar from this height, but it is still huge. Suddenly the world tips over and the room in the pocket disappears and you are pinned up against your captor as they sit down. You can't move at all and the pants cover most of you. You try to slip out, slowly, you get yourself out, finally, your legs are freed. You start walking up to the front of the pants in hopes of seeing your captor for the first time. From the front, you look up at the towering enormous kid, even sitting they are huge compared to you. They look like..
1211212112.title: You poke your head out

choices: Straight out in front of her
Down the side of her pants
12112121121.content: You see that you're in the lap of a giant 4 year old girl. She seems to be playing with a few toy dolls. The somewhat adorable little girl now seems like a terrifying monster. You need to escape quickly. The girl puts down the other toys in front of her, you see her reach into her pocket and feel around: She's looking for you. She gets confused for a moment and starts looking around, you know staying on her lap will get you found quick, so you make a dash down..
12112121121.title: A 4 year old girl

choices: You get through to her feet
121121211211.content: You make a dash out in her lap. With every step you take you feel your feet sink down into the thick diaper. You become nervous as she keeps looking around, her large young eyes spying the carpet at her sides, looking for you. You arrive at the drop off in the diaper, you jump off, landing between her enormous legs. You begin to venture forward, knowing that she is still searching, this time double checking the inside of her diaper for you. You pass her knees, barely developed but still 3 times your size. As you slip past..
121121211211.title: Straight out in front of her

1211212112112.content:
You run in between her legs. Just in front of you, past her feet was freedom. You looked back up at her and she was still looking for you. You had to run quick.

You run through her feet. They were a bit dirt from her not wearing any socks. Just as you reach the ball of her foot, the two feet slam into you. Pain rushes through your body as the toddler slammed her feet into you. You are able to crank your neck enough to see her giggling face looking down at you.

"He he, funny buggy."

She laughs at you as she playfully grinds you with her feet. You are in immense pain as the toddler crushes you with her feet. You could start to feel and hear your bones cracking. You didn't know how much more you could take.

"Funny bug fun to play with under my feet." She said. "I know what I'm going to do to you..."
1211212112112.title: You get through to her feet

12112122.content:
You make your way gingerly to the chest. Lucky you weren't grounded into a blood splatter in route. You look around a don't see your sister or any adults. Just kids... You start to panic. You see an older kid around 6 or so quietly playing with a doll close by. Next a sounds startles you as a toddler girl in overalls runs to the chest yelling "Yoys!".

You had to make a quick decision, run into the older one or stay and try to make use of the younger?
12112122.title: To the chest!

choices: She is oblivious to you (oh no)
121121221.content:
You decide to run to the 6 year old, you don't want to be a toy. As you ran to her you thought to yourself. "She is reasonable right? Though she is a little old to be in with these kids." She was wearing a white shirt and a red skirt. Half way to your destination something strange happened. She squatted down for no reason you could tell.

You kept running. Eventually you were hit by a pungent smell and a sound that made your stomach churn. You stopped in your tracks when you saw a whiteish brown fabric drop from the bottom of her skirt. "What? She is 6 and she is no where near potty trained! She stands up and starts walking towards you. You could now see the diaper sway due to the heavy load. You knew it was too late to move out of the way...

1211212211.content:
The child was already fast approching. She noticed you immediatly and as you looked up at her amazing size she was already smiling down with a mischivous look. Before your body could over come your fear her feet steped down right next to you. She let out an audible laugh and she pressed on the back of her diaper.

You noticed her whole body getting closer. Oh no she is!..

choices: She picks you up and plays with you
12112122112.content: You fell to the ground as the white mass made impact. The smushing sound was probably her poop in her diaper She wraped her legs around you to sit indian style on the floor. She finally spoke. "What a funny looking bug, I know just want to do with you!"
12112122112.title: Sitting next to you

121121221122.content: See looks at you and says "You better wun buggy!" Her legs opened up and you had an escape but as soon as you started running away you hard a rubbing sound and felt a presence right gaining on you. You looked back behind you to see the little girl scooting on her bottom trying to chase you down! You tried to run as fast as you were but you couldn't overcome the distance the toddler covered. The diaper hit you from behind and you feel forward. You were hurt on the ground but that was the least of your problems. Your legs were in horrible pain as she slide over top of them. Soon you were fully underneath of her and you started to be dragged against the floor. It all felt so bad you might be finished.
121121221122.title: She started scooting!

1211212211221.content:
The 6 year old smiles as she comes to a stop. She can't help but enjoy sitting on top of another bug. Vaugly, it's squirms vibrate through the fabric and into her, she giggles lightly at the feeling.

Meanwhile you find yourself face first into the ground, your lower half burnt from is painful scraping along the rug, your upper half crushed against the diaper. The smell is overwhelming and it begins to feel more like a cave than a little girl. A large shaking and loud noise are heard from above you. It's laughing. Suddenly the pressure releases, fresh air and light floods the space and you have just enough time to look up at the pink striped wall above you as her legs stretch in front. Before you can run it slams down again with heavy force. You feel like every bone is about to shatter, and then, the worst part comes. Her legs dig in and with all her young strength she pulls her bottom against the ground and brings herself forward.

You feel your bones start to shatter as the rancid diaper crushes and grinds your body away. She does it again, you watch as blood seeps in to the already wet diaper and turns the pink to a deep red. One more pull and you're obliterated. Your screaming is muffled and outside the girls giggling obscures it. Then: Silence. Her giggling is all that remains.

The girl feels the *pop* and feels her bottom completely touch the ground. She giggles a little more. Standing up, she gets to see the horror that remains of you ingrained in a long, bloody streak in the carpet. This is paired with the bloody streak going down the bottom of her sagging diaper. "Dumb bug.".

Before she can enjoy it further a woman picks her up. "Whew! You're getting a little old for stinkers like these, lets get this off of you." and with that she is gone, and with the exception of a stain that never quite leaves the carpet, so are you.
1211212211221.title: Smushed

The woman looked to be just about thirty you remember her working here when you where three years old, she was only sixteen and working here with her mom.

She takes you in, feeds you, and cares for you in her office. You sleep somewhat happy that night. When you wake up, she's out caring for kids. You start considering what may of lead up to you shrinking, surely there's a good explanation for this and maybe you can even get back to normal pretty soon. That night she helps you look for such solutions. She finds none and you sleep in her office once again. Upon waking up, you stand up and stretch, she's outside working with kids.

The handle of the door suddenly turns and in steps..
1211222.title: She takes care of you for a few days before los...

You decide to stay frozen, worried that she will discover you. She looks over you for a couple of minutes, trying to figure you out. Then she puts you..

You start to panick as the young attendant passes you off to a group of young girls.
"Found you a new toy" she says as she gives you to them. The group consisted of three girls, all of them six. As they run off to play with you, your blood runs cold as they approach a doll house and say, what should the new Dollie be?
121122221.title: With the kids

choices: She has a younger sibling who shes giving you to
She wants to keep you for her own desires
121122222.content:
She looks to her left, then to her right. Seeing that the coast is clear she carefully slips you into her pocket. It's extremely confined with her jeans fitting tightly to her you're left crampt in her pocket. You start to feel the rhythmic swaying as she steps forwards and the jeans constrict you to her. You start to her a muffled voice, its that of a girl, it must be her.

"Hmm? No, I haven't seen any toys like that around, I'm sure you'll find it."

Is she talking about you? Did she just lie? You hear the bell, she must be leaving. A car door opens and your world shifts as she sits down. You see that there is a little bit of room for you to perhaps squeeze out. You slowly try to maneuver yourself out, the space is extremely tight and you can barely breath as it heats up. Just as you're about to set yourself free the care stops suddenly and she gets out. You fall to the bottom of her pocket and are constricted once more.

The rhythm of her steps resumes and a door opens. You hear her take off her shoes and walk around a little, setting things down or maybe moving things. Finally, two fingers open the pocket, revealing a bright light as they descend right at you, you play dead again in hopes that she won't freak out or do something to you. They surround you and close on your chest. You feel yourself lifted into the light. As soon as she takes you out, you realize why she took you...
121122222.title: In her pocket

1211222221.content:
As your limp body is lifted into the light, your situation becomes clear. A 3 year old girl sits in the middle of a play-pen, which is filled with toys, many of which are torn apart or missing parts. You feel the hand holding you descend and then drop you. You fall through the air and land on a large pile of toys, you start rolling down the toys and then you hit the hard ground.

When you wake up, you're on the floor, and in quite a bit of pain. Around you, assorted dolls and toys lie broken with you. You manage to stand up and get yourself together. An immediate thought races through your head: Where is the girl?

Then you see a massive pink formation appear, darkening your sky. There she is: An enormous toddler, in her hand is a broken toy, with teeth marks, saliva, and missing parts all over it. She seems delighted, almost in a cruel way. She is wearing a small pink dress with flowers on it, misleading considering how badly she abuses her toys. She drops the broken toy onto the floor, with a snap. Her pink shoes kick the toy aside. Now you're scared. This innocent girl is now a monster.

She bends down and starts digging through the pile of toys, obviously looking for her next victim. As she tosses toys aside you start to see that if she sees you, you're done for. Her leg is just feet from you and if you move too fast, she'll surly see you. You begin to slowly make your way behind her in hopes on escaping her, as you make your way...
1211222221.title: She has a younger sibling who shes giving you to

12112222211.content:
She turns, and her dress flutters through the air as her toddler eyes lock onto you. A smile made up of her new teeth appears on her dirty young face.

"Yoy!" She yelps in babble as she starts to reach for you.

You start running, the shadow of her hand catches up to you and you can feel the warmth of her breath. Her tiny fingers easily wrap around your limp body and hoist you skyward. You feel a strong wind as she brings you up to her face, without hesitation, you watch as she parts her lips and starts to slip your head between them.

The wet and slimy toddler lips lead your head into what you now see is total hell. The slimy walls of the girls mouth drip with saliva as a very humid wind washes over you. Her tongue emerges and darts for the upper half of your body, grinding against your face. Saliva threatens to drown you as her taste buds scout you. You wonder how you must taste. Apparently good, considering the girl lets out an audible "Mmm". You feel her fingers let go of your legs and her lips tighten around your torso. Suddenly, her tongue jams you against the roof of her mouth and the pressure around you becomes unbearable, your ears pop and you start to lose consciousness. Shes sucking on you! Like a pacifier.

After several minutes, you can't hear and the saliva sticks to every part of your body. A rash has appeared from the toddlers violent rubbing as she sucks the flavor from you. You hope that she'll take you out before its too late..
12112222211.title: She sees you!

121122222111.content:
The girl stretches out and lies down in her bed for a much needed rest. Your legs dangle out of her mouth. You realize what is happening and hope that she'll stop sucking when she falls asleep, it is your only hope.

A few moments later you hear snoring. This is it!

Right?

It doesn't stop. She keeps sucking, her tongue even more aggressively slamming you into the hard roof of her mouth. The pain is insufferable as your bones break and your body liquefies under the enormous pressure of her sleeping tounge. You try to scream but the air can't enter your lungs. The sleeping girl keeps sucking, you close your eyes and feel yourself drifting away. After a few more moments you're completely gone, ground away into a liquid by a 3 year old sleeping toddler. When she eventually awakes, her young mind will have forgotten all about you, only remembering the distant taste in her mouth. Anything left of you will end up deep in her diaper the next day.
121122222111.title: Too late..

122.content:
You continue climbing up her shirt. As you reach her neck, you see Kelsey walk in.

"Come here, baby" Mary walks over to her, you still trapped on her shirt. Your older sister picks her up and sets her down in a high chair, its food time. You try to yell and get your older sisters attention, but its no use. She returns, placing a bowl of crackers on the high chair's table. You watch as the toddler grabs one and messily eats it, showering you in crumbs and saliva. One crumb hits you on the head, knocking you off of her shirt. You fall and slam into the table.

After a couple moments of agony, you open your eyes and stare into your toddler sisters eyes. You stand, happy to be seen. "Hey! Mary! It's your brother! Hey!" She doesn't do anything. Then her fingers lift towards you. Oh no..

You dive out of the way as she tries to grab you, her toddler hand just missing you. Crap. To her your just another thing on her plate, "Nummy" She booms and smiles, she goes for you again. You run around, trying to outsmart your sister. The small high chair table led to a steep drop onto the hard floor. That wasn't an option. Looking around you see that she is the best hiding space! You run at your sister as she prepares to finally get her food. You jump..
122.title: Climb higher

1221.content:
A wall of skin smacks you out of the air and then quickly and skillfully catches you. Before you even have time to react you find yourself staring into your baby sisters two giant eyes. She giggles loudly, blissfully unaware of who she is holding.

"Nummy!!" She booms, happy to have caught a new kind of snack. You start to scream and plead but within a second you watch as she opens her mouth and shoves you in violently. You scream more, only in hopes of someone hearing you, but her new baby teeth reach you almost immediately. With a loud crunch she smiles as your body is liquidied within her mouth, releasing a flavor she had never tasted before.

Some of your remains dribble out of her mouth and onto the highchair to be wiped up cleanly later, the rest is sent down her throat and into her awaiting and gurgling stomach to be digested and eventually used to help her growing body. The remains are dropped into a loaded diaper and thrown out.

Within 3 seconds of jumping you are a liquid in her stomach and on the high chair.

"Nummy." She giggles, satisfied.
1221.title: She grabs you

1222.content:
You jump at her, her little hand just missing you. You land on her pants, rolling until you hit her shirt. She quickly looks down, still trying to enjoy her food. You need to hide. Quickly. You manage to crawl into her shirt, her hand still searches for you as you look for an escape. A little of her diaper sticks out above her pants, it's not somewhere you'd like to be, but it's better than being crushed and eaten, so you crawl inside.

The very warm, small space seems secure enough. You feel her hand still looking for you. You sit down to rest as she goes back to eating. "Safe." You say to yourself happily. Then through the thick fabric you hear your older sisters voice. "All done?"

Before you can get out the world shifts and her legs extend and you tumble to the bottom of her diaper. She begins to walk around. You're tossed around the diaper, helpless to your sister. You need to escape before you join her waste. You try to get yourself out of the top..
1222.title: You make it

13.content:
You run across the hall into Kelsey's room. She is sitting on her bed, texting. This could be your best bet of getting help. You run across the clean carpet and grab a blanket that is dangling off of the bed. Slowly, you climb up it, finally reaching the top of her bed after a few minutes. In front of you, your sister is sitting up, her legs on the ground while she stares at her phone, which by itself is four times your size. You run over next to her and shout, but she can't hear you. You run to the side of her jeans and pull yourself up onto her, carefully avoiding the fall that would trap you between her two legs.

In front of you, your sister, now a mountain of cloth and girl, continues to text. You now have to scale the front of her. Grabbing a good hold of her top, you continue climbing as you had before. Sweat drips down as the clicking of her hands on the phone continue. You reach the halfway point in your climb, and above you is an obstacle you hadn't thought about. Her breasts extend out, completely blocking your route. You grab them, dangling off of them as you try to conquer their size. Eventually you do it and sit down on top of them, taking a needed break. You think about how this is even possible, while preparing to finish the climb.

A soft climb gets you to her shoulder, and from there you climb up her earring and into the cramped space you know as her ear. You open your mouth the yell for help and...
13.title: Go to Kelsey's room

131.content:
You start screaming into her ear as loud as you van, the cave echoes as you pray she somehow finds you. Apparently she hears something because she whips her head to the side looking for what made the sound. You go flipping through the air and land hard on the ground, barely conscious back where you started.

"I could've swore I heard..." she trails off and goes back to texting. You lie rolling in pure agony as you gaze up at the mountain that you just fell off of. You watch she bring the phone, several times bigger than you, up to her ear and start calling.

"Hey, I can't come over I've got no one to babysit.

...

I don't know where he is!

....

Right now? Like over the phone? Alright"

You start to realize what shes doing as she stands up and drops her pants. The avalanche of jeans reveals her slim legs leading up stories and stories to her newly exposed panties. Shes going to have phone sex right now!

At this moment she eyes you wriggling on the ground. "Hey, you'll never guess what I just found! A fucking bug! This is gonna be so fun!"

You start yelling and pleading but it is of no use. She easily reaches down and plucks you up. "Now now" she says aloud "Where do you want to go?" she smiles and takes you...

info.brief_description: One day you shrink to 1 inch tall, you quickly find that people don't notice you
info.description:
One day you suddenly shrink to just 1 inch tall. You don't know what happened, but you hope perhaps somehow you will be saved. But if not, you must at least avoid being unknowingly killed by those around you.

Characters:


You. Young, son of a wealthy dad and a mom who you've never met.
Kelsey. You're sister, a little older than you. Generally obnoxious.
Mary. You're other sister, 2 year old toddler, doesn't know much. Very curious and active.

--More can be added--
